verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these תּוֹלְדֹ֥ת <S%H8435><s%> tol-Dot These also [are] the generations אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron וּמֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> u-mo-Sheh; and Moses בְּי֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom, in the day דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [that] the LORD אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh with Moses בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in mount סִינָֽי׃ <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai. Sinai

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמ֥וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot And these [are] the names בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the sons אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron הַבְּכ֣וֹר׀ <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-Chor the firstborn נָדָ֑ב <S%H5070><s%> na-Dav; Nadab וַאֲבִיה֕וּא <S%H30><s%> va-'a-vi-Hu and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <S%H385><s%> ve-'i-ta-Mar. and Ithamar

הַקְרֵב֙ <S%H7126><s%> hak-Rev near אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh the tribe לֵוִ֔י <S%H3881><s%> le-Vi, Leviite וְֽהַעֲמַדְתָּ֣ <S%H5975><s%> ve-ha-'a-mad-Ta and present אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei them before אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen; the priest וְשֵׁרְת֖וּ <S%H8334><s%> ve-she-re-Tu that they may minister אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וְשָׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-me-Ru And they shall keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִשְׁמַרְתּ֗וֹ <S%H4931><s%> mish-mar-To, his charge וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִשְׁמֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H4931><s%> mish-Me-ret and the charge כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah, of the whole congregation לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; of the congregation לַעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> la-'a-Vod to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲבֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dat the service הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan. of the tabernacle

וְנָתַתָּה֙ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Tah And thou shalt give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, the Levites לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> le-'a-ha-Ron unto Aaron וּלְבָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> u-le-va-Nav; and to his sons נְתוּנִ֨ם <S%H5414><s%> ne-tu-Nim they [are] wholly given נְתוּנִ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> ne-tu-Nim given הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> hem-mah like ל֔וֹ lo, מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H854><s%> me-'Et among בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto him out of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בָּנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav and his sons תִּפְקֹ֔ד <S%H6485><s%> tif-Kod, And thou shalt appoint וְשָׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-me-Ru and they shall wait on אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כְּהֻנָּתָ֑ם <S%H3550><s%> ke-hun-na-Tam; their priest's office וְהַזָּ֥ר <S%H2114><s%> ve-haz-Zar and the stranger הַקָּרֵ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> hak-ka-Rev approach יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat. shall be put to death פ Peh

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לִי֮ li כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- for all בְּכוֹר֒ <S%H1060><s%> be-chOr Because all the firstborn בְּיוֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> be-yOm [are] mine [for] on the day הַכֹּתִ֨י <S%H5221><s%> hak-ko-Ti that I smote כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all בְּכ֜וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor all the firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt הִקְדַּ֨שְׁתִּי <S%H6942><s%> hik-Dash-ti I hallowed לִ֤י li כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all בְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> be-chOr unto me all the firstborn בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El, in Israel מֵאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> me-'a-Dam both man עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against בְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah; and beast לִ֥י li יִהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu become אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. mine shall they be I [am] the LORD ס sa-Mek

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> be-mid-Bar in the wilderness סִינַ֖י <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai of Sinai לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying
